document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Pigmy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Seraphs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">astray </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Velvet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">people </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Vevay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Belles </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">lost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">day, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">exclusive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Coterie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Paris </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">lay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">fold </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Belted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Emerald! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Venice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">show </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">cheek </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">tint </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">lustrous </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">meek. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">ambuscade </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">briar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">leaf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">displayed </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">damask </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">maid. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">rather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">wear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">grace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Earl's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">distinguished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">rather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">dwell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Duke </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Exeter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Royalty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">eno' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">subdue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Bumblebee. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Pigmy seraphs gone astray
